name: Visit to Chandra(Moon) Tal(Lake) in Spiti valley
description:
Chandra Tal or Moon lake is a camper's paradise. The name of the Chandratal lake originates from its
crescent shape. Located in the Himalayas, situated at the height of 4300m in
the Spiti part of the district of Lahaul and Spiti in the state of Himachal Pradesh(India).
